channel.title: Bluestacks on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: BlueStacks App Player for OS X, a review of an Android emulation environment
item.description: It doesn't run on 10.5.8, so I'm holding this review until after I upgrade to 10.6. It didn't work on 10.6.8 either, just coming up with a "Loading" screen that hangs their seemingly forever. I'm on an early 2008 MacBook, certainly not the fastest computer in the world, but one that is usually adequate to the task of running most software. After prompt help from Bluestacks tech support, I tried again, this time first closing my Chrome browser windows before starting.
